alert.note: Alert for Calvert (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 12 at 2:22PM EST until January 13 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Calvert County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 7 AM EST Saturday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, parking lots near Charles Street in Solomons begin to flood, with several inches of water covering low-lying portions of Charles Street and Williams Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two to two and a half feet above normal. The next high tide at Chesapeake Beach is at 4:48 PM and 4:48 AM. The next high tide at Solomons Island is at 2:52 PM and 2:59 AM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Chesapeake Bay at North Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/05 PM 2.0 0.6 0.8 1.0 None 13/04 AM 2.9 1.5 2.3 2.0 None 13/05 PM 2.6 1.2 1.5 0.5 None 14/05 AM 1.2 -0.2 0.6 0.5 None 14/06 PM 1.2 -0.2 0.1 0.5 None 15/06 AM 0.5 -0.9 -0.2 0.5 None Patuxent River at Solomons Island MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/03 PM 2.3 0.8 1.1 1.0 None 13/03 AM 3.4 1.9 2.4 1.0 Minor 13/03 PM 2.4 0.9 1.2 1.0 None 14/03 AM 1.5 0.0 0.5 1.0 None 14/04 PM 1.2 -0.3 0.0 1.0 None 15/05 AM 0.9 -0.6 -0.2 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
